actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Navy to sell certain types of aircraft no longer needed by the Navy to persons engaged in the business of controlling or extinguishing fires in national forests.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to sell specified types of aircraft no longer needed by the Navy to persons engaged in the business of controlling or extinguishing fires in national forests.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Navy to sell certain types of aircraft no longer needed by the Navy to persons engaged in the business of controlling or extinguishing fires in national forests.
